title: New OCE Tournament; Veileague
body:
OCE Summoners, the tournament you have been waiting for has arrived. Head on over to Veileague's site and read up on what it is and how you can participate.
Rego closes 10/08/2015. Be quick!
And if you don't have a team, don't fret. Use our team/player finder system.

On top of all the loot to be won, there is a $300 cash prize for the winners.

[veileague.wordpress.com](http://veileague.wordpress.com)

replies.body:
Hey, cool to see more tournament organisers popping up. Make sure to check out our community portal as we do provide prizing for certain tournaments!
http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

If you have any questions let me know

Hey Maraudaur, thanks for the encouragement!

League of Legends; best game in the world. Just want to give everyone a stage to shine on.
